item.title: New Blog Post on Tekki Gurus
item.description: I’m putting out a few blogs on a site called Tekki Gurus! It’s got lots of great stuff, my new blog post included. So if you want to know how to build your very first Power Automate flow, or you want to know how to get notifications from a Microsoft Form submission, then check it out! How to Create Microsoft Forms Notifications in Under 15 Minutes Using Power Automate
